Attorney General Barr’s performance has been deeply partisan and irresponsible. His attempts to spin the facts to fit the President’s narrative must cast doubt on his ability to enforce the law. We need to hear from Special Counsel Mueller, and we need the unredacted report.

I welcome the release of more of Special Counsel Mueller’s findings. Congress will weigh the evidence of wrongdoing independently, and take all appropriate action. However, I remain concerned about redactions and incomplete evidence. We must have the complete text.
